channel.title: [Look] My 2nd Model - Ninja Logo 21k Poly Count [Look]
channel.description: So this is a model I did, it took me literally forever, the poly count is 21k. This is my second model and if I can somehow reduce the poly count to 1500 then i could add to my server on a cape. It is not supposed to be 3D, i could make it, but I'm now lazy :P. Anyways If you want me to release it just say so. Here it is~ [img]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab50/lost72/ninja1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab50/lost72/ninja2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab50/lost72/ninja3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab50/lost72/ninja4.jpg[/img]

item.title: [Look] My 2nd Model - Ninja Logo 21k Poly Count [Look]
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Yeah but why bother? So it could be used in-game?
Just do it for the hell of it

item.title: [Look] My 2nd Model - Ninja Logo 21k Poly Count [Look]
item.dc:creator: @lost72 lost72
item.description:
@lost72 wrote:

jjones10:

Convert into what??? We are talking about two diferent things right now!

I’m pretty sure he means to reduce the 2d model’s poly count.

item.title: [Look] My 2nd Model - Ninja Logo 21k Poly Count [Look]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“jjones10, post:10, topic:286183”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=378515.msg2846961#msg2846961 date=1246333125]
Umm, I know this JJ, i was saying this high of poly for a 2D model is not needed. Practice is needed, but not soo high on a 2d. We need to get people more into 3d models rather than a simple trace. There have been an increasing number of 2d “models” in this forum. Im looking to stop them and get everybody back into 3d’s.

EDIT - Thanks for realising that im trying to be helpful. I do accept some 2d things but they require alot of detail for my acceptance.
[/quote]
So turn it into a 3d model… dont just give up on it when its only 2d. Im not saying your not trying to be helpful, i just want hime to finish his model. Thats all[/quote]
Yea, i was only saying it will need lower poly count to be remotely possible. Well, high poly 2d’s are possible to convert. Yet, they require ALOT of time.

Read full topic

item.title: [Look] My 2nd Model - Ninja Logo 21k Poly Count [Look]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

jjones10:

Why do you have [look] tags in your title?? thats my thing bro! Just kidding. But you should make this 3d

No point in making this 3d, its too high of poly to begin with, when it was not needed at all. Lowering the poly count is needed, and then attempting to make it 3d would be okay.

Read full topic

item.source: [Look] My 2nd Model - Ninja Logo 21k Poly Count [Look]

item.title: [Look] My 2nd Model - Ninja Logo 21k Poly Count [Look]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Dude, try to make a real model thats high poly. All you need to do is zoom in closely to make a high poly 2d model. I can make a simple 2d crown with 100k poly if i wanted to. Yet, it is a waste of time when that kind of detial for a 2d is not needed. Try making 3d models before being proud of high poly. No offense, but I am getting tired of high poly models that are only 2d on websites. They are not hard to do.

Read full topic
